```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}

# Directory containing images
image_dir <- "datahub_images"

# List of valid image extensions
valid_extensions <- c(".jpg", ".jpeg", ".png", ".gif")

# Function to check if a file has a valid image extension
is_valid_image <- function(filename) {
  tolower(tools::file_ext(filename)) %in% gsub("^\\.", "", valid_extensions)
}

# Get the list of image files in the directory
image_files <- list.files(path = image_dir, full.names = FALSE)
image_files <- image_files[sapply(image_files, is_valid_image)]

# Sort the image files
image_files <- sort(image_files)

# Number of banners you have
num_banners <- 4

# Ensure we have enough images by filling missing ones with a default image or empty string
if (length(image_files) < num_banners) {
  image_files <- c(image_files, rep("default_image.jpg", num_banners - length(image_files)))
}

# Assign image filenames to variables
image1 <- image_files[1]
image2 <- image_files[2]
image3 <- image_files[3]
image4 <- image_files[4]
  
```
